exm.mng: slow in one's reactions, sluggish (in movement or thought)
to postpone, to put off, to defer
to delay, to postpone, to keep putting sth off, to procrastinate, (computing) to lag
to be late, to arrive slowly, to be slow in the coming
the lingering death, the death of a thousand cuts (old form of capital punishment)
(idiom) no sooner said than done, before you know it
exm.pyn: shuō shí chí , nà shí kuài

exm.mng: to delay handing over (payment, homework etc)
Chi Haotian (1929-), Chinese Minister of National Defense 1993-2003
General Wei Chigong (585-658), famous military man instrumental in founding the Tang dynasty
